summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5792 lux), and cloud levels (up 608 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1537 m), light levels (up 8050 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 608.2m lower than yesterday, 1078.7m lower than past week, 1536.7m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1265.1m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2340m and 2800m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Showers, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright intervals likely. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
